title: It's Time to Stop Taking Sam Altman at His Word
dot:
digraph AI_Narrative{rankdir=LR; A[label="Understand AI for what it is,
not what it might become." shape=box style=filled fillcolor=lightblue];B[label="Sam Altman's Vision" shape=box style=filled fillcolor=lightgreen];C[label="Silicon Valley Mythmaking" shape=box style=filled fillcolor=lightgreen];D[label="Current AI Limitations" shape=box style=filled fillcolor=lightgreen];E[label="Techno-Optimism" shape=box style=filled fillcolor=lightgreen]; F[label="Promises of Prosperity
and Superintelligence" shape=ellipse];G[label="Need for Energy,

not just potential." shape=note style=dashed];A->N;}
